title: Content Blueprint AI Input
description: The professional configuration for content generation, blending automated pipeline intelligence with user-defined creative preferences.

openaiApiKey.title: OpenAI API Key (Secret)
openaiApiKey.description: A secret OpenAI API Key. For Apify Store users, this is handled by the actor owner. For direct use, provide your own key.

input_source.title: Input Source Mode
input_source.description: Choose how to provide the intelligence data. 'Dataset ID' is the standard way to use the output from the upstream actors.

dataset_id.title: Source Dataset ID
dataset_id.description: The ID of the dataset containing the enriched topics from the 'Sentiment Intel' or 'Keyword Opportunity' actor.

raw_json_topics.title: Raw JSON Topics List
raw_json_topics.description: A list of fully enriched topic objects for immediate processing. Use this for manual runs or testing.

max_topics_to_process.title: Max Topics to Process
max_topics_to_process.description: Limits how many high-priority topics (based on Trend Score) are processed for content generation.

creativity_level.title: Creativity Level (LLM Temperature)
creativity_level.description: Higher values yield more creative ideas. Lower values are more focused. (Converts to a 0.0-1.0 float).
